title: "Cyborg Line Art"
content:
# Cyborg Line Art

Welcome to Cyborg Line Art, a website dedicated to showcasing minimalist line art of cyborgs. Our collection features striking and eye-catching designs in bold colors such as bright red and blue.

Our website is the perfect destination for those who appreciate the beauty of simplicity and want to add a touch of futuristic flair to their desktop or mobile device. Whether you're looking for a new wallpaper for your phone or computer, or simply enjoy admiring beautiful artwork, we've got you covered.

Browse our collection and find the perfect cyborg line art to suit your style. All of our designs are available for download in high-resolution, so you can enjoy them in all their glory. Stay tuned for new additions to our collection, as we are constantly updating with fresh and exciting designs.

Thank you for visiting Cyborg Line Art, we hope you enjoy our collection as much as we do!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
